name: San Francisco Public Library
description: The San Francisco Public Library has 30 branches located throughout the city of San Francisco. Many branches have internet access with varying policies as well as cultural diverse media and literature. Additionally, library branches offer immigrant services, youth programs, resume building workshops, professional preparation, cultural programs, and other useful resources. Library hours vary by branch and are subject to being changed. For the latest open hours, visit SFPL's website. San Francisco
